title: The teens tricking Instagram
description:
How teenagers have created their own way to preserve their digital privacy...for the ‘gram.

Featuring
@Pr0d1g4
@alfredwkng

Links
Teens have figured out how to mess with Instagram's tracking algorithm

Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
